EmailTemplate.description: Salesforce.com Phase I Roll-out - Leadership Message
EmailTemplate.name: ROLL-OUT: Leadership Message
EmailTemplate.subject: An Important Message Regarding Salesforce.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.FirstName},
Please click the link below and select Leadership Message to view an important video regarding Salesforce.com from Greg Fern, Vice President and General Manager of Sears Commercial.
http://hslearning.intra.sears.com/HSL/Training/Salesforce-Training.aspx
Best, Dave
